name: Haddonstone Ltd
description:
Haddonstone is the UK’s leading manufacturer of high-quality landscape ornaments and architectural cast stone.

The company’s dry cast Haddonstone and wet cast TecStone provide excellent thermal mass benefits. TecLite, the revolutionary material produced by Haddonstone, used GRC technology to provide thin wall solutions, using less raw materials.

All three materials exceed all relevant British and international standards.

Haddonstone was recently awarded the prestigious International Green Apple Gold Award (Building Materials) for Environmental Best Practice and Sustainable Development by the Green Organisation for restoration work at Scarborough Spa.

An inspirational 204 page catalogue is available, detailing Haddonstone’s extensive standard designs, ranging from balustrading, columns and porticos to window surrounds, pier caps and landscape ornaments.
address:
The Forge House
Church Lane

product_images.title: Balustrading from Haddonstone
product_images.description:
Haddonsone’s cast stone balustrading can be formed into straight, ramped, curved and spiral configurations and is used on steps, balconies and parapets.

Contact Haddonstone's contracts staff for more information on 01604 770711, e-mail info@haddonstone.co.uk, visit www.haddonstone.com or see a member of the contracts staff on stand S700.

product_images.title: Haddonstone TecLite Georgian Door Surround
product_images.description:
The Georgian Door Surround by Haddonstone is made from the comapny's revolutionary TecLite GRC material.

The stylish door surround comprises two Tuscan pilasters surmounted by a complementary entablature and is available in five standard colours.

Ideal for retro-fit, new build and refurbishment projects, Haddonstone's Georgian Door Surround is hand-made at the company's purpose built production facility in Northamptonshire.
